languages.text: "Мои спутники должны быть полезными. Впредь старайся действовать в моих интересах".
"I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."
languages.original_text: "Мои спутники должны быть полезными. Впредь старайся действовать в моих интересах".

traits.locale_text: "I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."
"I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."
"I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."
"I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."
"I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."

languages.text: "Ich erwarte nützliche Unterstützung von den Mitgliedern meines Gefolges. Ihr werdet von nun an versuchen, in meinem Interesse zu handeln."
languages.original_text: "I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erwarte nützliche Unterstützung von den Mitgliedern meines Gefolges. Ihr werdet von nun an versuchen, in meinem Interesse zu handeln."

languages.text: « J'attends des membres de mon entourage qu'ils se rendent utiles. Tâchez d'agir dans mon intérêt à l'avenir. »
languages.original_text: "I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."

traits.locale_text: « J'attends des membres de mon entourage qu'ils se rendent utiles. Tâchez d'agir dans mon intérêt à l'avenir. »

languages.text: “我希望我的随行人员能为我提供帮助。从现在开始，我要你尽心尽力为我的利益着想。”
languages.original_text: "I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."

traits.locale_text: “我希望我的随行人员能为我提供帮助。从现在开始，我要你尽心尽力为我的利益着想。”

languages.text: «Espero que los miembros de mi séquito me resulten útiles. A partir de ahora se esforzará en la medida de sus posibilidades por obrar en mi beneficio».
languages.original_text: "I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que los miembros de mi séquito me resulten útiles. A partir de ahora se esforzará en la medida de sus posibilidades por obrar en mi beneficio».

languages.text: 「従者たちに全員は、役立つ働きを期待している。これからは、何よりも{mf|俺|私}の利益のために尽力してもらうぞ」
languages.original_text: "I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."

traits.locale_text: 「従者たちには、役立つ働きを期待している。これからは、{mf|俺|私}の利益のために尽力してもらうぞ」

languages.text: "Maiyetimdekilerin işe yarar olmasını beklerim. Bundan böyle benim çıkarlarıma göre hareket etmeye çaba göstereceksin."
languages.original_text: "I expect members of my retinue to offer useful assistance. You will endeavour to act in my interests from here on out."

traits.locale_text: "Maiyetimin üyelerinden işe yarar bir yardımda bulunmalarını beklerim. Bundan böyle benim çıkarlarıma göre hareket etmeye çaba göstereceksin."
